title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, English Language and any two (2) subjects from the following:

Biology,

Fine Art,

Chemistry,

History

English Language,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Technical Drawing,

Business Method.

'O' Level pass in Fine Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Technical Drawing.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: FIVE (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IN ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS, PHYSICS  PLUS ANY OTHER TWO IN BASIC SCIENCE SUBJECTS
subjects: MATHEMATICS, PLUS ANY OTHER IN PHYSICS, CHEMISTRY, BIOLOGY, GEOGRAPHY, ECONOMICS, COMMERCE ETC.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from: Biology/Agricultural Science Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal Work, Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.), Further Mathematics.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements: FIVE (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IMATHEMATICS, ENGLISH,  PLUS ANY OTHER THREE IN BASIC SCEINCE SUBJECTS
subjects: MATHEMATICS, PLUS ANY OTHER TWO PHYSICS, CHEMISTRY, BIOLOGY, ECONOMICS, ART, ETC.

title: MARKETING
utme_requirements: FIVE (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE, MATHEMATICS, PLUS ANY OTHER THREE (3) OF ECONOMICS, COMMERCE, GEOGRAPHY, PRICINCIPLES OF ACCOUNT, GOVERNMENT IRK, OFFICE PRACTICE ETC.
subjects: MATHEMATICS AND ANY OTHER TWO SUBJECTS OF GEOGRAPHY, COMMERCE, PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNT, GOVERMMENT, HISTORY, ECONOMICS ETC.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: FIVE  (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IN ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS, PHYSICS, AND OTHER TWO (2) IN BASIC SCIENCES AND ENGINEEERING
subjects: ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS, PHYSICS AND ANY OTHER IN BASIC SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
utme_requirements: FIVE (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE, MATHEMATICS, PLUS ANY OTHER THREE (3) IN GOVERNMENT, ECONOMICS, COMMERCE, GEOGRAPHY, PRICINCIPLES OF ACCOUNT,  IRK, OFFICE PRACTICE ETC.
subjects: ENGLISH LANGUAGE, GOVERNMENT/HISTORY AND ANY OTHER IN SOCIAL SCIENCES SUBJECT

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT
utme_requirements: FIVE (5) 'O' LEVEL CREDIT PASSES IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE, MATHEMATICS, PLUS ANY OTHER THREE (3) OF ECONOMICS, COMMERCE, GEOGRAPHY, PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNT, GOVERNMENT IRK, OFFICE PRACTICE ETC.
subjects: ENGLISH LANGUAGE, GOVERNMENT/HISTORY,  AND ANY OTHER TWO OF GEOGRAPHY, COMMERCE, ECONOMICS, PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNT

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics
